title: EP 49: The Gatekeeper
description: Why do some people feel the need to gatekeep? From the art world to the corporate world, Black gatekeeping is real. Today we hear a classic gatekeeping experience from the comedy duo Frangela, and talk to author Jennifer Farmer about the deep-seated reasons why some people still feel the need to gatekeep.
itunes:title: The Gatekeeper
itunes:subtitle: Sometimes, the ones keeping us from entering the gate are Black like us.
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
